full_text: Ee yo Beart: 2019/KER/1026 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY ,THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 170 of 2019 cc 1673/2017 OF J.M.F.C.-II, KANNUR CRIME NO. 732/2013 OF VALAPPATANAM POLICE STATION , KANNUR PETITIONER/S: VINAYA CHANDRAN NAIR.C, AGED 45 YEARS, S/O. CHANDRAN NAIR, N2 QUARTERS, THE THIRUMALA DEVASWOM MEDICAL COLLEGE, VANDANAM P.O, ALAPPUZHA. BY ADVS. SRI.ARUN CHANDRAN SMT .NISHA GEORGE RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, HIGH COURT CAMPUS, ERNAKULAM, PIN CODE 682031 2 THE STATION HOUSE OFFICER, VALAPATTANAM POLICE STATION, VALAPATTANAM, KANNUR DISTRICT PIN CODE 670 010 OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2019/KER/1026 Crl.MC.No. 170 of 2019 1i2.. ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioner is the accused in CC No. 1673 of 2017 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-II, Kannur. His only request is to direct the magistrate to dispose of Annexure-II application filed by him under Section 239 Cr.P.C. 3. After hearing both sides, I am satisfied that the request is reasonable. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of directing the learned magistrate to dispose of Annexure-II application within two months from the date of receipt or production of a copy of this order, whichever is earlier. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE Bka/10.01.2019 trac peo 2019/KER/1026 Cr1.MC.No. 170 of 2019 ..3.. APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE 1 TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 732 OF 2013 SUBMITTED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT ANNEXURE ITI TRUE COPY OF THE PETITION IN CRL.M.P NO. 6713 OF 2018 IN CC NO. 1673/2017 FILED UNDER SECTION 239 OF THE CODE OF CRIMINAL PROCEDURE DATED 07-08-2018. ANNEXURE III TRUE COPY OF THE CRL.M.P NO. 6830 OF 2018 IN C.M.P NO. 6713 OF 2018 IN C.c NO. 1673/17 FILED BY THE PETITIONER BEFORE THE JFCM (32) KANNUR ANNEXURE IV TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER IN CMP 6830/2018 IN CC NO. 1673 OF 2017 DATED 15-10-2018 PASSED BY THE JFCM (2), KANNUR ANNEXURE V TRUE COPY OF THE PROCEEDINGS SHEET IN c.Cc NO. 1673 OF 2017 PENDING ON THE FILES OF JFCM (2), KANNUR.
